thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 27 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-PNM Resources Sees 2018 EPS Of $1.82-$2.16 From Cont. Ops

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-PNM Resources Sees 2018 EPS Of $1.82-$2.16 From Cont. Ops
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Pnm Resources Inc:
* PNM RESOURCES REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR-END RESULTS
* SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.82 TO $1.92 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* SEES FY 2019 EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.04 TO $2.16 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* QUARTERLY ONGOING DILUTED EPS $0.24 * QUARTERLY GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.68 * SAYS 2018 AND 2019 ONGOING EARNINGS GUIDANCE AFFIRMED * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.19 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.76 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +1 646 223 8780)
